string.value: If you wish to turn your #t1902006# into a #t1902007# again, you must go see #b#p1102002#, the Mount Instructor#k.

#p1102002# said he's learned to summon #t1902007# from #p1101001#, but that he couldn't do such a favor for someone who's careless enough to lose his #t1902007#. He then proposed that you pay him #b100,000,000 Mesos#k as a testament of your devout determination to never lose your Mount again.
You paid 100,000,000 Mesos to #p1102002# and received a #t1902007#.

You want to grow #t1902006# into #b#t1902007##k? Aren't you being a little greedy now? You should be happy that your Mount has become a #t1902006#. Someone like you should never be given the luxury of having a #t1902007#.

...But I can't prevent your #t1902006# from wanting to become a #t1902007#. Alright, I've learned to summon #t1902007# from #p1101001#, so it shouldn't be too hard to please you. I shall turn your #t1902006# into a #t1902007#.

But I can't do it for free. You must pay me #b100,000,000 Mesos#k as a testament of your devout determination to never lose your Mount again. If you agree to that, I will grow your #t1902006# into a #t1902007#. What? It's too costly? Perhaps you should have thought about it before you went and carelessly lost your Mount.
Then bring your #t1902006# along with 100,000,000 Mesos.
Hm, too bad. If you don't want to pay the fee, enjoy riding your #t1902006#.
Oh, have you brought 100,000,000 Mesos like I asked you to? Good. Alright, I'll put your #t1902006# in a Hyper Incubator as #p1101001# taught me and hatch it into to a #t1902007#.
Please do not lose your #t1902007# again. Take care of your friend!
